mapper.sql: id, HRV AS hrv, sbp_ave AS sbpAve, dbp_ave AS dbpAve, Heartrate, Bloodoxygen, microcirculation, Amedicalreport, respirationrate, phone, imei, createtime
mapper.select: set @rownum=#{pageNum}; SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as id,tc.name,CASE WHEN HRV IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE HRV END as HRV, CASE WHEN sbp_ave IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE sbp_ave END as sbp_ave, CASE WHEN dbp_ave IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE dbp_ave END as dbp_ave, CASE WHEN Heartrate IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Heartrate END as Heartrate, CASE WHEN Bloodoxygen IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Bloodoxygen END as Bloodoxygen, CASE WHEN microcirculation IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE microcirculation END as microcirculation, CASE WHEN respirationrate IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE respirationrate END as respirationrate, substring(tp.phone,9) as phone,DATE_FORMAT(tp.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createtime,tt.count,tl.step_when FROM jfhealth_new tp INNER JOIN (SELECT name,id,imei FROM user WHERE isDelete=0 AND love=0 AND role='使用者') tc ON substring(tp.phone,9)=tc.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT phone,COUNT(*) as count FROM jfhealth GROUP BY phone ) tt ON tp.phone=tt.phone LEFT JOIN (SELECT user_id,SUM(step_when) AS step_when from equipment_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY user_id) tl ON substring(tp.phone,9)=tl.user_id LEFT JOIN equipment ta ON tc.imei=ta.imei LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM admin WHERE id=#{adminId}) tf ON tf.agentId=ta.agentid WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tp.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jfhealth_new tp INNER JOIN (SELECT name,id,imei FROM user WHERE isDelete=0 AND role='使用者') tc ON substring(tp.phone,9)=tc.id LEFT JOIN equipment ta ON tc.imei=ta.imei LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM admin WHERE id=#{adminId}) tf ON tf.agentId=ta.agentid WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tp.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT '置顶' as id,tc.name, CASE WHEN HRV IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE HRV END as HRV, CASE WHEN sbp_ave IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE sbp_ave END as sbp_ave, CASE WHEN dbp_ave IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE dbp_ave END as dbp_ave, CASE WHEN Heartrate IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Heartrate END as Heartrate, CASE WHEN Bloodoxygen IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Bloodoxygen END as Bloodoxygen, CASE WHEN microcirculation IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE microcirculation END as microcirculation, CASE WHEN respirationrate IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE respirationrate END as respirationrate, substring(tp.phone,9) as phone,DATE_FORMAT(tp.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createtime,tt.count,tl.step_when,tc.love FROM jfhealth_new tp INNER JOIN (SELECT name,id,imei,love FROM user WHERE isDelete=0 AND love=1 AND role='使用者') tc ON substring(tp.phone,9)=tc.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT phone,COUNT(*) as count FROM jfhealth GROUP BY phone ) tt ON tp.phone=tt.phone LEFT JOIN (SELECT user_id,SUM(step_when) AS step_when from equipment_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY user_id) tl ON substring(tp.phone,9)=tl.user_id LEFT JOIN equipment ta ON tc.imei=ta.imei LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM admin WHERE id=#{adminId}) tf ON tf.agentId=ta.agentid LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT tg.gender, SUM(IF(tg.Heartrate <= 49,1,0)) as heartrate1, SUM(IF((tg.Heartrate >= 50 AND tg.Heartrate <= 59),1,0)) as heartrate2, SUM(IF((tg.Heartrate >= 60 AND tg.Heartrate <= 69),1,0)) as heartrate3, SUM(IF((tg.Heartrate >= 70 AND tg.Heartrate <= 79),1,0)) as heartrate4, SUM(IF((tg.Heartrate >= 80 AND tg.Heartrate <= 89),1,0)) as heartrate5, SUM(IF((tg.Heartrate >= 90 AND tg.Heartrate <= 100),1,0)) as heartrate6, SUM(IF((tg.Heartrate > 100),1,0)) as heartrate7 FROM ( SELECT tp.*,CASE WHEN tc.gender='男' THEN 0 WHEN tc.gender='女' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS gender FROM ( SELECT substring(phone,9) as phone,CASE WHEN Heartrate IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Heartrate END as Heartrate FROM jfhealth_new WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y') ) tp INNER JOIN (SELECT id,gender from user WHERE isDelete=0 AND role='使用者') tc ON tp.phone=tc.id ) tg GROUP BY tg.gender

SELECT SUM(IF((sbp_ave<90 AND dbp_ave<60),1,0)) as blood1, SUM(IF((sbp_ave>=90 AND sbp_ave<120 AND dbp_ave>=60 AND dbp_ave<80),1,0)) as blood2, SUM(IF((sbp_ave>=120 AND sbp_ave<139 AND dbp_ave>=80 AND dbp_ave<89),1,0)) as blood3, SUM(IF((sbp_ave>=140 AND sbp_ave<159 AND dbp_ave>=90 AND dbp_ave<99),1,0)) as blood4, SUM(IF((sbp_ave>=160 AND sbp_ave<179 AND dbp_ave>=100 AND dbp_ave<109),1,0)) as blood5, SUM(IF((sbp_ave>=180 AND dbp_ave>110),1,0)) as blood6 FROM ( SELECT substring(phone,9) as phone,CASE WHEN sbp_ave IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE sbp_ave END as sbp_ave,CASE WHEN dbp_ave IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE dbp_ave END as dbp_ave FROM jfhealth_new WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y') ) tp INNER JOIN (SELECT id,name from user WHERE isDelete=0 AND role='使用者') tc ON tp.phone=tc.id

SELECT SUM(IF((microcirculation>=80),1,0)) as microcirculation1, SUM(IF((microcirculation>=70 AND microcirculation<80),1,0)) as microcirculation2, SUM(IF((microcirculation>=50 AND microcirculation<70),1,0)) as microcirculation3 FROM ( SELECT substring(phone,9) as phone,CASE WHEN microcirculation IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE microcirculation END as microcirculation FROM jfhealth_new WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y') ) tp INNER JOIN (SELECT id,name from user WHERE isDelete=0 AND role='使用者') tc ON tp.phone=tc.id

SELECT SUM(IF(tp.Bloodoxygen<94,1,0)) as bloodoxygen1, SUM(IF((tp.Bloodoxygen>=94 AND tp.Bloodoxygen<=99),1,0)) as bloodoxygen2 FROM ( SELECT substring(phone,9) as phone,CASE WHEN Bloodoxygen IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE Bloodoxygen END as Bloodoxygen FROM jfhealth_new WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y') ) tp INNER JOIN (SELECT id from user WHERE isDelete=0 AND role='使用者') tc ON tp.phone=tc.id

SELECT SUM(IF((respirationrate>=24),1,0)) as respirationrate1, SUM(IF((respirationrate>=12 AND respirationrate<24),1,0)) as respirationrate2, SUM(IF((respirationrate<12),1,0)) as respirationrate3 FROM ( SELECT substring(phone,9) as phone,CASE WHEN respirationrate IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE respirationrate END as respirationrate FROM jfhealth_new WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y') ) tp INNER JOIN (SELECT id from user WHERE isDelete=0 AND role='使用者') tc ON tp.phone=tc.id

SELECT tp.imei,tp.id,tt.name,Heartrate,sbp_ave,dbp_ave,microcirculation,respirationrate,Bloodoxygen,HRV,DATE_FORMAT(tp.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createtime FROM jfhealth tp LEFT JOIN equipment td ON tp.imei=td.imei LEFT JOIN user tt ON substring(tp.phone,9)=tt.id LEFT JOIN admin tz ON tz.agentId=td.agentid WHERE tz.id=#{agentid} AND tt.isDelete=0
AND tp.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')
AND tt.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY createtime DESC LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT tp.imei,tp.id,tt.name,Heartrate,sbp_ave,dbp_ave,microcirculation,respirationrate,Bloodoxygen,HRV,DATE_FORMAT(tp.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createtime FROM jfhealth tp LEFT JOIN equipment td ON tp.imei=td.imei LEFT JOIN user tt ON substring(tp.phone,9)=tt.id LEFT JOIN admin tz ON tz.agentId=td.agentid WHERE tz.id=#{agentid} AND tt.isDelete=0
AND tp.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')
AND tt.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY createtime DESC ) tr

SELECT imei,substring(phone,9) as phone,Heartrate,sbp_ave,dbp_ave,microcirculation,respirationrate,Bloodoxygen,HRV,Amedicalreport,DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createtime FROM jfhealth WHERE 1=1
AND phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')
AND imei LIKE CONCAT('%',#{imei},'%')
AND createtime LIKE CONCAT('%',#{createtime},'%')
LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from( SELECT imei,substring(phone,9) as phone,Heartrate,sbp_ave,dbp_ave,microcirculation,respirationrate,Bloodoxygen,HRV,Amedicalreport,DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createtime FROM jfhealth WHERE 1=1
AND phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')
AND imei LIKE CONCAT('%',#{imei},'%')
AND createtime LIKE CONCAT('%',#{createtime},'%')
) tf
